resources.string: My name is Prithvi Karkera and I am a masters student at Pace University majoring in Computer Science. I have 2 years of work experience as a system engineer at Infosys India. I have completed my bachelors of engineering in Electronics and telecommunication. I have worked on self driving car using Raspberry Pi during my final year project.I live with my family at New Jersey.
I like to code and watch soccer matches.
